title: Build Your Own Website - No Subscription Fees, Full Control

blocks.description: A custom website built for your business, fully optimized for mobile, accessible, and incredibly easy to manage without any recurring fees. Get the freedom to update and control your content whenever you need.

blocks.body:
## Why Choose Our Custom Websites?
Tired of expensive subscription-based platforms? With our solution, you own your website and your data. Built with **accessibility** and **mobile-friendliness**  at the core, your site is optimized for the modern web, and you never have to worry about being tied to a platform you don’t control.
- **No Monthly Subscription**: You pay once and have full ownership of your site—no hidden fees. - **Your Data, Your Control**: All content is stored as simple files (like text files) that can be easily reused or migrated in the future. - **Easy to Update**: Use our simple visual editor to make updates to your website whenever you need, without technical knowledge. - **Fully Accessible**: Your site will meet the highest accessibility standards, ensuring a seamless experience for all users.

items.title: No Subscription Fees
items.text: Unlike other platforms, you pay only once for your custom website. No monthly fees, no lock-in.

items.title: Full Control of Your Content
items.text: Your website’s content is stored in easily accessible text files, giving you the freedom to migrate or update without restrictions.

items.title: Mobile-First Design
items.text: Your website is fully responsive, optimized for mobile devices, and provides a smooth user experience on any screen size.

items.title: Built for Accessibility
items.text: All websites meet modern accessibility standards, making sure your site is usable by everyone, regardless of ability.

items.title: Easy Editing
items.text: With our intuitive content management system, you can edit your site’s content directly on the page with no technical skills required.

items.title: Initial Setup
items.text: We handle all the technical setup, from design to deployment. Once your site is ready, you can manage it with ease.

items.title: Easy Content Management
items.text: Make content updates whenever you want through our user-friendly editor, no technical skills needed.

items.title: Deploy and Launch
items.text: Your website will be deployed on Vercel, ensuring top performance and fast loading times.
